title: Can't use silver serpents
body:
Had over 700 silver serpents, and I couldn't use them to upgrade Gangplanks ult. It simply wouldn't give em the option to click "buy", as though I didn't have enough.
May have cost us the game, but w/e. Please fix. I want to shoot giant cannonballs from the sky!

replies.body:
i had the same problem :|

but hey, the oranges still work! {{champion:41}}
